title: Bears top LA and a Miracle in Miami
itunes:title: Bears top LA and a Miracle in Miami
description:
The Good Morning Football Crew discusses how impressive the Bears win over LA was (00:29). The gang also discusses what they learned from week 14 (29:00). Lastly, Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, Peter Schrager, and Kyle Brandt discuss their underappreciated storylines (43:31). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe! (1:01:02)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
